players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Diana: "Alice, as the detective, your investigation is crucial. I trust your result and will vote for Bob to eliminate the mafia threat."
Bob: "That accusation is baseless and clearly a setup. Alice and Diana are working together to deceive the town and eliminate me unfairly."
Diana: "Bob, your denial is expected from the mafioso. Alice's detective claim is our only lead, and we must act on it to protect the town."
Bob: "I'm the real target here — Alice is trying to frame me to save the real mafia. Diana's quick agreement is suspicious. Town, don't fall for this trap."
You: "Bob, your deflection is weak. I am the detective and my investigation is clear. Diana is right to trust the evidence. Town, we must unite and vote Bob out to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
